definition: arrow/dart/straight/to vow/to swear/old variant of 屎[shi3]
(bird species of China) common pheasant (Phasianus colchicus)
(bird species of China) buff-throated monal-partridge (Tetraophasis szechenyii)
(bird species of China) Himalayan monal (Lophophorus impejanus)
(bird species of China) pheasant-tailed jacana (Hydrophasianus chirurgus)
(bird species of China) Hainan peacock-pheasant (Polyplectron katsumatae)
(bird species of China) grey peacock-pheasant (Polyplectron bicalcaratum)
(bird species of China) Blyth's tragopan (Tragopan blythii)
(bird species of China) Reeves's pheasant (Syrmaticus reevesii)
(bird species of China) Sclater's monal (Lophophorus sclateri)
(bird species of China) Elliot's pheasant (Syrmaticus ellioti)
(bird species of China) satyr tragopan (Tragopan satyra)
(bird species of China) Temminck's tragopan (Tragopan temminckii)
(bird species of China) Chinese monal (Lophophorus lhuysii)
(bird species of China) blood pheasant (Ithaginis cruentus)

sentences.english: The dog flushed a pheasant from the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 那只狗于雉从灌木丛中惊起。

sentences.english: Curassows have delicious flesh and are hunted as game.
sentences.chinese: 凤冠雉是猎禽，肉味鲜美。

sentences.english: When the young hoatzins have learned to fly, they lose their claws.
sentences.chinese: 当麝雉学会了飞行，他们的爪子将退化消失。

sentences.english: And I also went pheasant hunting with the sheikh while I was there.
sentences.chinese: 我还和酋长一起去打猎，很多雉鸟。

sentences.english: Changxing County Stadium in the town stadium Pheasant Road.
sentences.chinese: 长兴县体育馆位于雉城镇体育场路。

sentences.english: A flock of spectacled teals soars over Geumgang Lake in Gunsan, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 一群铜翅水雉在金刚山湖面掠过，韩国。

definition: a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
wild beast/wild horse/lion/trad. form used erroneously for 貌/simplified form used erroneously for 狻
(bird species of China) common pheasant (Phasianus colchicus)
to hunt/to go hunting (as winter sport in former times)/hunting dog/imperial tour
